summary: Puerto Rico's economy has been in decline for much of the last 15 years and was devastated by 2017's hurricanes. To bolster and diversify its economy, Puerto Rico is trying to increase air cargo and passenger traffic at its 3 international airports. We looked at issues related to Puerto Rico's effort to expand air cargo operations. Stakeholder views on this effort varied. For example, some...
title: Puerto Rico: Perspectives on the Potential to Expand Air Cargo Operations
